p:
Thermal analysis ( Figure S4) indicates that Rb 3Na(H 2C 3N 3O 3) 4·3H 2O has two main steps of mass loss from the TG curve. There are 10% mass losses in the first small stage in the temperature range of 150–200 °C for the loss of three crystal water molecules per formula unit. The second large stage in the temperature interval between 350 and 600 °C lost mass is about 40%, which is similar to the calculated value and can be assigned to the decomposition of the (H 2C 3N 3O 3) − groups.
52 DSC curve shows that the smaller peaks at 184 °C and the stronger peaks at 378 °C represent the endothermic peaks of water molecules and (H 2C 3N 3O 3) − groups, respectively.
